title: IGN: Bobby BellPepper Silver 2 Bot lane main
body: im looking to join a team as an adc or support either or is good for my i play best in bot lane in general... looking to try out or even form one off this post... also looking for tilt proof teamates as well... and no this doesnt mean ppl that are passionate about the game and get frustrated we all do when we compete i just want to have 4 other teamaates that dont give up so easily and have the desire to win!!!

replies.body: might wanna try the NA boards my friend :) this is OCE but if you have an oce acc feel free to add me :)
